${ModID}:Polishing.NAME: Polishing
${ModID}:Polishing.DESCRIPTION: 每当 you play an Attack, increase its damage by !M! 本场战斗。

${ModID}:WorkHammer.NAME: Work Hammer
${ModID}:WorkHammer.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! ${ModID}:Front damage. NL Give enemy !M! Plated Armor。

${ModID}:Chained.NAME: Chained
${ModID}:Chained.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL Give 所有敌人 !M! 点 格挡 。

${ModID}:StormStrike.NAME: Storm Strike
${ModID}:StormStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! ${ModID}:Feral damage. NL 给予 !M! 层 易伤。

${ModID}:WarSong.NAME: War Song
${ModID}:WarSong.DESCRIPTION: 给予 !M! 层 易伤. NL 获得 !${ModID}:m2! 活力。

${ModID}:Rapier.NAME: Rapier
${ModID}:Rapier.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! ${ModID}:Front damage. NL Goes through 格挡 。

${ModID}:Fall.NAME: Fall
${ModID}:Fall.DESCRIPTION: Deal ${ModID}:Front damage equal to the number of cards in your NL 抽牌堆 + 6。
${ModID}:Fall.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 固有 。 NL Deal ${ModID}:Front damage equal to the number of cards in your NL 抽牌堆 + 6。

${ModID}:Turtle.NAME: Turtle
${ModID}:Turtle.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL Your next Attack deals ${ModID}:Feral damage。

${ModID}:Bolas.NAME: Bolas
${ModID}:Bolas.DESCRIPTION: Apply *Slow. NL Give enemy !M! 点 格挡 。 NL Draw !${ModID}:m2! card. NL 消耗 。
